title: Oswald Rantucci
text:
Oswald Rantucci (1907–1988) was a highly respected Classical Guitar teacher at The State University of New York at Buffalo,
for whom the Rantucci International Guitar Festival & Competition is named. He was also a friend and professional associate of the revered classical guitarist Andres Segovia.


== See also ==
International classical guitar competitions


== References ==
http://library.buffalo.edu/music/spcoll/evenings.html
Almquist, Sharon G. (1 January 1992). "Music at the University of Buffalo-The Baird Years". American Music. 10 (1): 53–79. doi:10.2307/3052143. JSTOR 3052143.
